title: AED Game Character Voice - The Pharaoh
description: Immerse yourself in regal splendor with The Pharaoh – unbreakable, majestic, a ruler whose presence commands unwavering loyalty in the realm of the ancient and divine.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Album Art by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character Voice - The Pharaoh voice-over sound library provides you with more than 300+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences. 


The Pharaoh voice profile is deep, raspy and dripping with cursed energy. He is perfect for Mummies, Egyptian Undead, Gods or any in-game non-player characters and game characters with elements of Undeath. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in a clean and dry audio format in case you want to further process the vocals with effects.


Features:


-Vocal Profile: Undead, Magical, Male, Raspy, Withered, Throaty

- Perfect for NPC's in game and/or film based trailers.

-Featuring custom lines and NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack, I do not serve I rule. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.

-Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your next hero or villain in game!

-Works with any DAW or Game Engine

- Royalty Free and YouTube friendly

- Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Male voice-over audio files

109 MB of voice samples

All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format


Number of Audio Waves: 304


Number of Audio Cues: 304


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit


Do Sound FX loop: No


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
